trans-unit.source: How to configure Facebook authentication for your App Services application
trans-unit.target: How to configure Facebook authentication for your App Services application

trans-unit.source: Learn how to configure Facebook authentication for your App Services application.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to configure Facebook authentication for your App Services application.

trans-unit.source: How to configure your application to use Facebook login
trans-unit.target: How to configure your application to use Facebook login

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to configure Azure Mobile Apps to use Facebook as an authentication provider.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to configure Azure Mobile Apps to use Facebook as an authentication provider.

trans-unit.source: To complete the procedure in this topic, you must have a Facebook account that has a verified email address and a mobile phone number.
trans-unit.target: To complete the procedure in this topic, you must have a Facebook account that has a verified email address and a mobile phone number.

trans-unit.source: To create a new Facebook account, go to [facebook.com].
trans-unit.target: To create a new Facebook account, go to [facebook.com].

trans-unit.source: Register your application with Facebook
trans-unit.target: Register your application with Facebook

trans-unit.source: Log on to the [Azure Management Portal], and navigate to your Mobile App.
trans-unit.target: Log on to the [Azure Management Portal], and navigate to your Mobile App.

trans-unit.source: Copy your **URL**.
trans-unit.target: Copy your **URL**.

trans-unit.source: You will use this to configure your Facebook app.
trans-unit.target: You will use this to configure your Facebook app.

trans-unit.source: Click **Settings**, **User authentication**, and then **Facebook**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Settings**, **User authentication**, and then **Facebook**.

trans-unit.source: Then copy the **Redirect URI** from the Facebook blade.
trans-unit.target: Then copy the **Redirect URI** from the Facebook blade.

trans-unit.source: You will use this with your Facebook app.
trans-unit.target: You will use this with your Facebook app.

trans-unit.source: In another browser window, navigate to the [Facebook Developers] website and sign-in with your Facebook account credentials.
trans-unit.target: In another browser window, navigate to the [Facebook Developers] website and sign-in with your Facebook account credentials.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) If you have not already registered, click **Apps** then click **Register as a Developer**, accept the policy and follow the registration steps.
trans-unit.target: (Optional) If you have not already registered, click **Apps** then click **Register as a Developer**, accept the policy and follow the registration steps.

trans-unit.source: Click **My Apps**, then click **Add a New App**.
trans-unit.target: Click **My Apps**, then click **Add a New App**.

trans-unit.source: Select **Website** as your platform.
trans-unit.target: Select **Website** as your platform.

trans-unit.source: Choose a unique name for your app, and then click **Create New Facebook App ID**.
trans-unit.target: Choose a unique name for your app, and then click **Create New Facebook App ID**.

trans-unit.source: Pick a category for your application from the dropdown.
trans-unit.target: Pick a category for your application from the dropdown.

trans-unit.source: Then click **Create App ID**.
trans-unit.target: Then click **Create App ID**.

trans-unit.source: On the next page, select **Skip Quick Start** in the top right.
trans-unit.target: On the next page, select **Skip Quick Start** in the top right.

trans-unit.source: This will take you to the developer dashboard for your application.
trans-unit.target: This will take you to the developer dashboard for your application.

trans-unit.source: On the **App Secret** field, click **Show**, provide your password if requested, then make a note of the values of **App ID** and **App Secret**.
trans-unit.target: On the **App Secret** field, click **Show**, provide your password if requested, then make a note of the values of **App ID** and **App Secret**.

trans-unit.source: You will set these on your Mobile App's Facebook authentication settings blade.
trans-unit.target: You will set these on your Mobile App's Facebook authentication settings blade.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] **Security Note**
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] **Security Note**

trans-unit.source: The app secret is an important security credential.
trans-unit.target: The app secret is an important security credential.

trans-unit.source: Do not share this secret with anyone or distribute it within a client application.
trans-unit.target: Do not share this secret with anyone or distribute it within a client application.

trans-unit.source: On the left navigation bar, click **Settings**.
trans-unit.target: On the left navigation bar, click **Settings**.

trans-unit.source: Type the **URL** of your Mobile App in **App Domains**, and enter a **Contact Email**.
trans-unit.target: Type the **URL** of your Mobile App in **App Domains**, and enter a **Contact Email**.

trans-unit.source: If you don't see a website section below, click **Add Platform** and select **Website**.
trans-unit.target: If you don't see a website section below, click **Add Platform** and select **Website**.

trans-unit.source: Enter the **URL** of your Mobile App in the **Site URL** field, then click **Save Changes**.
trans-unit.target: Enter the **URL** of your Mobile App in the **Site URL** field, then click **Save Changes**.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Advanced** tab and add your Mobile App **Redirect URI** that you copied earlier to **Valid OAuth redirect URIs**.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Advanced** tab and add your Mobile App **Redirect URI** that you copied earlier to **Valid OAuth redirect URIs**.

trans-unit.source: Then click **Save Changes**.
trans-unit.target: Then click **Save Changes**.

trans-unit.source: Your redirect URI is the URL of your Mobile App gateway appended with the path, _/signin-facebook_.
trans-unit.target: Your redirect URI is the URL of your Mobile App gateway appended with the path, _/signin-facebook_.

trans-unit.source: For example, `https://contosogateway.azurewebsites.net/signin-facebook`.
trans-unit.target: For example, `https://contosogateway.azurewebsites.net/signin-facebook`.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that you are using the HTTPS scheme.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that you are using the HTTPS scheme.

trans-unit.source: The Facebook account which was used to register the application is an administrator of the app.
trans-unit.target: The Facebook account which was used to register the application is an administrator of the app.

trans-unit.source: At this point, only administrators can sign into this application.
trans-unit.target: At this point, only administrators can sign into this application.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate other Facebook accounts, click **Status & Review** in the left navigation bard.
trans-unit.target: To authenticate other Facebook accounts, click **Status & Review** in the left navigation bard.

trans-unit.source: Then click **Yes** to enable general public access.
trans-unit.target: Then click **Yes** to enable general public access.

trans-unit.source: Add Facebook information to your Mobile App
trans-unit.target: Add Facebook information to your Mobile App

trans-unit.source: Back in the [Azure Management Portal], and navigate to the Facebook setting blade for your Mobile App again.
trans-unit.target: Back in the [Azure Management Portal], and navigate to the Facebook setting blade for your Mobile App again.

trans-unit.source: Paste in the App ID and App Secret values which you obtained previously.
trans-unit.target: Paste in the App ID and App Secret values which you obtained previously.

trans-unit.source: Then click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Then click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: You are now ready to use Facebook for authentication in your app.
trans-unit.target: You are now ready to use Facebook for authentication in your app.

trans-unit.source: Related Content
trans-unit.target: Related Content

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
